name: Ray of Enfeeblement
description: A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack; on a hit, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength until the spell ends. At the end of each of its turns, it can make a Constitution saving throw to end the effect.

effects.description: On a hit, target deals half damage with Str-based weapon attacks until spell ends. At the end of each of its turns, it can make a Con save to end.
